post_detail.description: BBDO challenged Click 3X and ClickFire Media to create the Elements of Everyday Life, a Vine-based video content site for the Samsung Galaxy Active.  Using in house writer director team Josh and Vince, Click 3X shot more than 30 Vines.  ClickFire Media then produced a responsive design website based on the content, fully integrating with Vine and the Twitter Card API for enhanced social-share visibility.
